alert.note: Alert for Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:28PM CDT until July 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WESTERN SHAWNEE COUNTY... At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willard, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Topeka, Dover, Silver Lake, Auburn, Willard and Pauline. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 346 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 166 and 176. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
